meanings.definition: Not capable of being carried out or accomplished.
meanings.sent1: The plan to build a castle made of candy was unfeasible.
meanings.sent2: It was unfeasible for the cat to catch the speeding car.
meanings.sent3: Trying to fit an elephant into a tiny box is unfeasible!
meanings.sent4: Her dream of flying without wings seemed as unfeasible as walking on water.
meanings.sent5: The idea of growing a money tree in the backyard was completely unfeasible.

meanings.sent1: Wearing a ball gown to the beach was unfeasible.
meanings.sent2: It was unfeasible to expect a snowstorm in the middle of summer.
meanings.sent3: Trying to teach a fish to ride a bicycle would be unfeasible!
meanings.sent4: His plan to become a superhero overnight was as unfeasible as winning the lottery without buying a ticket.
meanings.sent5: The idea of traveling to Mars in a paper airplane was clearly unfeasible.
